title: Instructional Design Strategies to Enhance School Readiness in Dual-Language Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in early childhood education or supporting dual-language learners, along with basic instructional design theory
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capacity of in-service practitioners to design educational programs tailored to the developmental stages of dual-language learning children.

learning_goals: Design educational activities that enhance early literacy skills (writing and print comprehension) in dual-language children by applying explicit instructional methods according to developmental stages
Build educational environments and develop instructional materials considering cultural and linguistic differences
Apply tools to assess school readiness of dual-language learners in blended learning environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
